49.eng-name: The Book of the Etiquette of Judges

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Bakrah said:"Allah protected me with something that I heard from the Messenger of Allah [SAW]. When Chosroes died, he said: 'Whom have they appointed as his successor?' They said: 'His daughter.' He said: 'No people will ever prosper who entrust their leadership to a woman

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ اسْتِعْمَالِ النِّسَاءِ، فِي الْحُكْمِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Appointing Women for Judgment
